discourse_list.title: Know Your MIP #15 | MIP87 | OUSD Decentralized Rewards

content.content: Know Your MIP #15 | MIP87 | OUSD Decentralized Rewards      Slides from the presentation For this series’ 15th session, we will host the team behind MIP87 to discuss another proposed strategy to deploy funds from the PSM to generate yield. MIP87: OUSD Decentralized Rewards is a proposal by Origin Protocol to deploy up to 33% of the PSM’s USDC into Origin Dollar (OUSD), a rebasing yield-generating stablecoin, to enable income via a solution that allows MakerDAO to retain custody over the funds. @Recognized-Delegates & the Maker Community are invited to join this discussion to explore how the Origin Protocol MIP compares the other opportunities to leverage the PSM for revenue.  If you can’t make this call, post any questions you may have for our guests on this forum post, and our hosts will ask them during the Q&A.  We will host…  Origin Protocol Cofounder Josh Fraser @joshfraser  Origin Protocol BD Manager Peter Gray @pete  Origin Protocol Head of BD Andra Nicolau @OGblackswan    Join us! @Retro  will host.  Agenda:  MIP87 Presentation by the Origin Protocol Team Open Community Q&A   When Time in your local-timezone format: 2022-10-25T16:00:00Z Mark it on your Google Calendar!  Where CrowdCast Call   crowdcast    Know Your MIP #15 | MIP87 | OUSD Decentralized Rewards Register now for Know Your MIP #15 | MIP87 | OUSD Decentralized Rewards on crowdcast, scheduled to go live on October 25, 2022, 11:00 AM CDT.      Attn: @Core-Facilitators @Recognized-Delegates @GovAlpha-Core-Unit @strat-fin-core-unit @Risk-Core-Unit @collateral-core-unit @SES-Core-Unit

Know Your MIP #15 - Editorial October 25th, 2022  Agenda   00:00: Intro with Retro   00:51: Presentation, Discussion & Questions w/ Origin Protocol   36:09: Conclusion   Video https://youtu.be/Hg0tPdE1kzE  Introduction  Retro  Hello, MakerDAO community. I am Retro from the SES CU. Welcome to Know Your MIP episode #15. Today we are joined by the team from Origin Protocol, who are behind MIP87, to discuss another proposed strategy to deploy funds from the PSM to generate yield.   Presentation  Origin Protocol 00:51  MIP87 & Origin Dollar1616×916 89.3 KB   Us1619×915 173 KB   History of Origin Protocol1614×913 138 KB   Team1623×914 134 KB   Investors1620×925 108 KB   Motivation for MIP871615×928 90.5 KB   "Trusted Custodians"1614×918 101 KB   Our Solution: OUSD1615×915 94.8 KB   What is OUSD?1622×914 60.2 KB   What is OUSD?1620×922 142 KB   Receive all your yield in OUSD automatically1615×916 128 KB   Historical yields1617×916 124 KB   What is OUSD?1607×918 159 KB   ...What is OUSD?1615×913 127 KB   Security1610×914 171 KB   A quick recap on previous MIPs1610×917 64.3 KB   Maker proposals submitted recently1608×916 105 KB   What is MIP871623×916 89.2 KB   Origin Dollar Governance(OGV)1611×912 147 KB   ousd.com1619×903 123 KB   Questions 15:15 - Ryan McNamara: Is there a risk for impermanent loss when LPing? 16:51 - ElPro: What are some of the Strategic Hardles that Origin faces, and what are the protocol’s pivotal challenges? What decisive actions are being taken to overcome it? 20:31 - Retro: About two years ago, there was a hack. Can you speak about the lessons learned and the growth from that experience? 24:08 - Retro: Can you speak about the legal structure? 27:04 - Flip Flop Flap Delegate: What are some of the Business Dev. actions being taken to overcome some of the barriers to exceed and excel beyond where you are today? 34:31 - Retro: Any last word?  Outro  Retro 36:09  Thank you, everyone, for joining. Let us keep up to date with this proposal and the rest of MakerDAO governance at the Forum.    Credits  Kunfu-po produced this summary. Everyone who spoke and presented on the call.
